dialogue.text: Last night it was the full moon.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.text: Ohhh, if I could tell you how bad I feel...
Anna tries to cheer him up with his favorite squeaky toy.

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.text: Look, it’s your piggy! Let’s play!

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.text: I’m too tired... You can play with it yourself!

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.question: Anna becomes anxious. What should Anna do?

choices.text: Ask for advice in the Dog Friends Facebook Forum.
Find a vet and book an appointment.

dialogue.text: Last night it was the full moon. The neighbours' dog has been barking all night. It has been a tough night, you know.
In the early morning delivery man knocks the door. Cooper became angry because he was abruptly awakened from a deep sleep.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.text: Who is that mean person who won't let you sleep at such an early hour?
Anna opens the door and says "Good morning" to delivery man.
Next second Cooper is out of the door and bits delivery man into leg. Pants are damaged. Leg is in blood.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.text: Pfff... I am going to sleep!!!
Next second Cooper is out of the door and bits delivery man into leg. Pants are damaged. Leg is in blood.

choices.text: Close the door, switch off the lights - nobody's at home.
Apologize profusely and promise to talk with your dog.
Apologize and offer medical help and pay for the pants.
